clinical_study.brief_title: Drug Use Investigation for TYKERB Tablet (All Case Investigation)
clinical_study.official_title: Drug Use Investigation for TYKERB Tablet (All Case Investigation)

brief_summary.textblock: Data on the safety and efficacy of TYKERB shall be collected from the patients in order to grasp the actual conditions of post-marketing use and assess background information on the patients.

primary_outcome.measure: The incidence of adverse events in Japanese patients treated with TYKERB based on prescribing information under the conditions of general clinical practice

arm_group.description: Patients with HER2 overexpressing inoperable or recurrent breast cancer

study_pop.textblock: All patients who have "HER2 overexpressing inoperable or recurrent breast cancer" and have received TYKERB for the first time

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patients with HER2 overexpressing inoperable or recurrent breast cancer
Exclusion Criteria:
- Patients with hypersensitivity to lapatinib or any components
- Pregnant women and women suspected of being pregnant
